game

Class ZombieLimb

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Item
      • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.WeaponItem
        • game.ZombieLimb
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Capable, Printable, Weapon, ItemInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ZombieArm, ZombieLeg

    public abstract class ZombieLimb
extends WeaponItem
    An abstract class Represents a Zombie limb which could be crafted to a Weapon
    Author:
    JulianYH

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Weapon asWeapon()
      Checks whether this limb has a capability of "WEAPON" If there is none, then it cant be used as a weapon (Player need to craft first) If there is, then it can be used as a weapon
      void removeCapability(java.lang.Enum<?> capability)
      Removes the capability given as input and change the name of the limb to the intended weapon name This method is called specifically by CraftWeaponAction

    • Constructor Detail

      • ZombieLimb

        public ZombieLimb(java.lang.String name,
                  char displayChar,
                  int damage,
                  java.lang.String verb,
                  java.lang.String craftTo)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the Limb
        displayChar - the display char of the limb
        damage - the amount of damage this limb does after it is crafted to a weapon
        verb - the verb used for this weapon (after it is crafted)
        craftTo - the name of the weapon after it is crafted

    • Method Detail

      • asWeapon

        public Weapon asWeapon()
        Checks whether this limb has a capability of "WEAPON" If there is none, then it cant be used as a weapon (Player need to craft first) If there is, then it can be used as a weapon
        Overrides:
        asWeapon in class Item
        Returns:
        a reference to the current Item as type Weapon, or null if this Item isn't a Weapon

      • removeCapability

        public void removeCapability(java.lang.Enum<?> capability)
        Removes the capability given as input and change the name of the limb to the intended weapon name This method is called specifically by CraftWeaponAction
        Specified by:
        removeCapability in interface Capable
        Overrides:
        removeCapability in class Item
        Parameters:
        capability - the Capability to remove
